movie.title: Ghost Hoax
movie.description_intro: Murder and madness envelop a pair of wedding videographers when they rig a hoax in a real haunted house. What is real? What is not real? Only the body in the morgue can reveal the truth about what happened in that house.
movie.description_full: Murder and madness envelop a pair of wedding videographers when they rig a hoax in a real haunted house. What is real? What is not real? Only the body in the morgue can reveal the truth about what happened in that house.

movies.title: Playing with Dolls: Havoc
movies.summary: When serial killer Havoc escapes from his prison, there is no holding back. He descends upon unsuspecting lovers in their cabin get away. The world's most brutal killer is loose and his thirst for blood cannot be stopped.
movies.description_full: When serial killer Havoc escapes from his prison, there is no holding back. He descends upon unsuspecting lovers in their cabin get away. The world's most brutal killer is loose and his thirst for blood cannot be stopped.

movies.title: Compulsion
movies.summary: Sadie, a budding erotic novelist, is enticed by Alex, her ex-lover to join him and an enigmatic woman, Francesca at an Italian villa for a weekend celebration being held to honor the release of her latest book. Once there, she is confronted by the demons of her past as she becomes embroiled in a surreal game of murder and betrayal.

movies.title: Wretch
movies.summary: In an attempt to piece together fractured memories of a drug-fueled night in the woods, three friends confront guilt, jealousy, and a supernatural presence that threatens to expose their true natures.
movies.description_full: In an attempt to piece together fractured memories of a drug-fueled night in the woods, three friends confront guilt, jealousy, and a supernatural presence that threatens to expose their true natures.

movies.title: The Conjuring 2
movies.summary: In 1977, paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to London, England, where single mother Peggy Hodgson believes that something evil is in her home. When Peggy's youngest daughter starts showing signs of demonic possession, Ed and Lorraine attempt to help the besieged girl, only to find themselves targeted by the malicious spirits.
